effect.shortEffect: If a Pokémon with Electromorphosis is hit by an attack, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.
effect.full: If a Pokémon with Electromorphosis is hit by an attack, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

description.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
